original_title: 死ぬほど嫌いな義父の大好物は女子〇生のワタシでした…
overview: Minami Aizawa is a schoolgirl whose Mom remarried this order guy named Shinjo.  Minami deeply dislikes him and she quickly notices that Shinjo is a bad apple, but keeps silent about it, to protect her Mom’s happiness…  –  Nakata and Minami together as the protagonist duo is a dream match. They both act so well.  She also gets roughed a bit and does a good attempt to deep throat. Minami’s beauty does the rest plus she shows a good bit of her nice ass.  Minami continues to be one of the very best in the industry.  Overall, a pretty good movie with solid sex scenes.
title: My Father-in-law Hates Me To Death, But His Favorite Food Is Me As A Schoolgirl… Minami Aizawa
